name: LineArt
description:
LineArt

Collect all of the things!

Created in a week for Godot Wild Jam #43, “Combine”.

Controls

Menu navigation with arrow keys, Enter, Esc/Backspace.

Move with left/right arrow keys.

Known Issues

Esc will exit fullscreen if in browser. Use backspace or controller as a workaround.
